Title: Beat the Devil
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Romance
Writer: Claud Cockburn (based on the novel "Beat the Devil" by), Truman Capote (screenplay), John Huston (screenplay)
Actors: Humphrey Bogart, Jennifer Jones, Gina Lollobrigida, Robert Morley
Plot: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...
